channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Super Micro just hired a new auditor that might save it from getting the boot from Nasdaq
item.description: The Nvidia-adjacent server maker hired BDO USA after its former auditor quit because it couldn’t trust the management team or the board of directors.

item.title: The market is giving an opportunity to buy one of the best performing stocks ever, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down the trade in AutoZone.

item.title: Consumer sentiment rises in December, as do inflation concerns
DOGE's Musk, Ramaswamy want Congress to back huge spending cuts. That's a tough sell
item.description: Congress' enthusiasm for smaller government is tempered by the difficulty of agreeing on what to cut.

item.title: The S&P 500 is up nearly 30% for the year. Don't expect such high returns to continue, experts say
item.description: The S&P 500 is up nearly 30% this year so far. But it's important for investors to remember that years like this one are rare, financial advisors caut...

item.title: Kim Kardashian posts video testing Tesla Optimus AI robot and Cybercab: ‘There’s no driver?’
item.description: Kardashian posted a video playing rock-paper-scissors with Optimus, a human-sized AI robot that Musk has promised “can babysit your kids” or help arou...

item.title: Slain UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson’s tenure was marked by rocketing profits—and accusations of insider trading and coverage denial
item.description: Following Thompson’s death, social media erupted with grievances about the health care giant and private insurers in the U.S.

item.title: Unemployment rate jumps more than a percentage point for Black women in November
item.description: The unemployment rate jumped significantly for Black women in November.

item.title: Is $1 million is the magic number to start estate planning? No, it's lower.
Amazon has caught up in the AI race, analysts say, and its stock surges
Tesla jumps as Elon Musk’s ‘bet for the ages’ on Trump is seen paying off with federal self-driving rules
item.description: Tesla stock jumped after a report said Trump's transition team is prioritizing the creation of federal framework for fully autonomous cars.

item.title: The best-performing AI stock this year isn't Nvidia
The stock market’s ‘fear gauge’ is down. Retail investors should take note.
Boeing’s plea deal shot down by judge because the independent monitor would be a DEI hire
item.description: The scandal-plagued aerospace group has 30 days to come up with a new plan with the Justice Department.

item.title: CFPB sues Comerica Bank, alleging it failed to administer federal benefits program
item.description: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau accused the bank of intentionally terminating calls and mishandling fraud complaints.
